name: oppgle
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cple, c2), cfv(cple, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cple, c2), cfv(cple, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cple, c2), cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wceq(cple, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat0)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cn)
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (le ` c2)=(le ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ le = Slot(cdc(1, 0))
⊣ cdc(1, 0)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 0)≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wceq(cple, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat0)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cn)
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(le ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(le ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ le = Slot(cdc(1, 0))
⊣ cdc(1, 0)∈ ℕ
⊣ cdc(1, 0)≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cn)
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat2)

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat2)

body.origin:
|- wne(cdc(nat1, nat0), nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wbr(nat2, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(le ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(le ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)

comment: less-than relation of an opposite group. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Apr-2018.)
